newsitem.title: UK: Key stock and currency market movements at 1700 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Key stock and currency market movements at 1700 GMT.

text.p: The following table shows the latest close of key indices* on major world stock exchanges, the day's change in points and the indices' 1996 closing highs and lows (with dates). Also shown are the London closing values of the German mark, the Japanese yen, the British pound and gold bullion (previous day's closes in brackets):
- - - - FOREIGN EXCHANGE/GOLD BULLION CLOSE IN LONDON Dollar/mark... 1.5390 (1.5575)

Pound/dollar.. $1.7123 ($1.6909) Gold (ounce).. $369.05 ($369.35) - - - - *INDICES USED AND THEIR ALL-TIME CLOSING HIGHS New York Dow Jones industrial average -- 6,547.79 (Nov 25/96) London FTSE 100 index -- 4,118.5 (Dec 31/96) Tokyo Nikkei average -- 38,915.87 (Dec 29/89) Frankfurt DAX-3O index -- 2,909.91 (Dec 5/96) Paris CAC-40 General index -- 2,355.93 (Feb 2/94) Sydney Australian All-Ordinaries index -- 2,424.6 (Dec 31/96) Hong Kong Hang Seng index -- 13,530.95 (Nov 27/96)
